resources.string: Oi, eu sou Dijon ;)\nO que deseja saber sobre mim?

Development (improvement & maintaining) requirements on the layers of Embedded Android platform (Apps, Framework) on the smartphones and tablets with Android OS delivery for Latin America.
Besides working on the customization and development of Samsung's Android operating system.
Some activities:
▪ Android native source code maintenance and bug fix;
▪ Development of new features and maintenance of an ERP system using .NET Windows Forms and DevExpress Libraries\n▪ Construction of queries and procedures using Oracle’s PL/SQL
▪ Development of new features with Java EE
Oi Dijon, tudo bem? encontrei seu app no github e gostaria de conversar sobre uma possível vaga, Aguardo seu retorno.
